website_summaries.verdict: A front-facing carrier for dog parents who literally treat their pets like they're babies.
pros: Designed to comfortably carry your dog as you both face the same way
Has a layer of sponge between the dog and your stomach to maximize comfort for both
Comes with a breathable mesh to help heat escape
Good for up to small-medium dogs (the XL can carry up to 22 lbs.)
cons: Dogs might struggle to get comfortable as they're awkwardly situated

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for emergency situations
customer_reviews.text: My 12lb jack russel mix fit PERFECTLY in the size large! I bought this for preparation for hurricane Irma. After seeing Harvey leave so many dogs stranded in Houston I wanted to make sure I had a safe way to have my dog with me and at the same time be able to protect myself by having both my hands free in the event of an evacuation or rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mehl

customer_reviews.title: Great! Got it for my dachshund.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is well-made. I plan on using it to take my dachshund hiking. It is so hard finding things that fit such a long dog... She is 10lbs with a 14 inch back. I got the large and it works! (but is a little wide). The only thing I would change is that it could have more padding on the shoulder straps (for the human wearing it). That said, they are criss crossed it the back and very secure. Doxie
customer_reviews.author: DeeZitro

customer_reviews.title: Great for my lil dog
customer_reviews.text: We love taking our dog hiking, camping, and just everywhere in general. This carrier is not only great for hiking (to carry him when he gets tired), but it's also been super useful for taking him around town. About his shame-face-- he's still getting used to it lol!!
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Oh go on,  buy it
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the best unnecessary purchase I've ever made. We took our dog to Chimney Rock and she needed help going down. Not only did she comfortably fit, but she seemed to genuinely enjoy being carried around. For reference, she's a 9.6lb chihuahua with a big booty and she fit this perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely carrier! Small size is perfect for my little kitten...
customer_reviews.text: My 3-month old kitten fits well into a Small size backpack. I add a plush little blanket to the bottom so she's extra comfortable. It gets used several times a week. I think I will have to upgrade to the next size as she's growing. Which is fine, because I might want another color then...
customer_reviews.author: Lenchika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Pay attention to sizing
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a Large for my dog but it was too small. Sent it back, got a refund, and received the new one all within a week! He is about 16lbs, jack russel terrier / wiener dog mix so he is a little long. The XL fits perfect. Once he is inside of it he is super mellow & happy (the picture does not do it justice... he likes it). There is even a little hole for his tail! I got this because he is a lazy hiker, hopefully, we will both enjoy this haha :) Would definitely recommend this product and seller. Overall good experience.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good carrier
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large for my 17-lb shih tzu. He fits in it just fine. Not too big or too small. I would like it better if the Velcro straps at the top were a little bit longer or were actually plastic clips instead. I'm not thrilled with trusting those two little Velcro pieces to keep my dog upright. I'll probably add a pin or maybe even see the Velcro shut to be safe. I'd also like it if the adjustable straps had a stropper on them. Otherwise, this is a great little carrier for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle and Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: A big “no” from corgi pup and me
customer_reviews.text: I just about died with laughter when I got my 25-30 lb corgi into this. It was hilarious for me (hence the video) but he was NOT amused. He did not look comfortable and I was not comfortable either. It felt like he was going to fall through!! I set him free immediately after this clip ended and returned it. By the way, this was the largest size that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on the person well, not easy to put on the person/dog, nothing locks to secure the dog in (just zippers which could come unzipped very easily), and the stretchy part at the top that goes under the dog’s chin basically chokes the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The return process was amazing and I'm extremely grateful for that
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old 2.5 pound Morkie puppy fell out of it when the zipper came unzipped and he hit the cement! It was the first time we tried it out and I was to terrified to put him back in it again, so we returned it. The return process was amazing and I'm extremely grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Matocha

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat nail trimming
customer_reviews.text: I used the Pawaboo Pet Carrier Backback to keep my kitty cat, Joey, immobilized while I trimmed his nails with clippers. It worked great even though he didn't like it. I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Judith U.

customer_reviews.title: You may not see the camouflaged pug...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old pooch, who can no longer keep up with the puppy. Just moved to a new city and there's lots of green space worthy of long walks and now she can come along! Warning: you will get SO many looks and bring smiles to the world around you. A person would have to be soul-less not to crack a grin. Maintain eye contact for maximum effect. My only complaint would have to be the lack of padding on the shoulders. It really isn't too bad over a t-shirt, but I could imagine it hurting on bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: PugGod

customer_reviews.title: Must order!!
customer_reviews.text: Our pup is obsessed with it, and so are we! We have a 12 lb Pomeranian and ordered the large one and it fits perfectly! He has plenty of wiggle room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great way to carry my older dog around the house while doing choirs. My small Chihuahua fits perfectly in it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Large perfect size for my 10 lb fur baby.
customer_reviews.text: Large is the perfect size for my baby. It's a little loose with his summer haircut but will be perfect when his hair is long
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Useless. The sizing is strange when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Useless. The sizing is strange when it comes to arms and legs and torso. I also read that it’s not good to carry dogs this way for fear of their hips. Never used it. My niece uses it for her dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonit Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Put my dog in it and he screamed like I nearly killed him
customer_reviews.text: Not for dachshunds. Put my dog in it and he screamed like I nearly killed him. Terrible design for a dogs back. I have put him in many carriers but this type was terrifying. Going to monitor him because I'm worried it may have done serious damage.
customer_reviews.author: SaraO

customer_reviews.title: I bought the wrong size, I have a 12lb ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong size, I have a 12lb shih tzu mix who is apparently too tall for this, I bought a medium size. *Update: Seller contacted me after 3 star review and offered to send a large at no charge. I feel a little bad about it, it was my fault for ordering the wrong size in the first place, but now I have a large which seems to work great. I'm using it to carry around my dog with a broken leg to give him a break from being locked up in the in his cage all day while being in recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Richmon

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting dog into this straight jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting dog into this straight jacket! Only half good idea was having a hole for the tail! Would not recommend! I even tried a larger one thinking how much I was determined to get this to free up one arm of mine at least but it was like a torture device for both of us.. don’t waste your time or money!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. I needed something that would let me carry ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. I needed something that would let me carry my new puppy while walking my two adult dogs. My little guy seemed comfortable and I didn't have to worry about what he was doing in the house when I was out with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty awesome....my dog doesn't look thrilled but deep down she is 😂 but in all seriousness it will come In handy with storms and fireworks. We have tried everything out there to help with her anxiety including prescriptions now. She gets so worked up that all we can do is put her in her cage in the basement. She has bit her tongue trying to chew her way out of her cage and has lost teeth also. For now till we find the right med for her this is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Make sure you get the correct size! "Small" is REALLY small!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these so our Chihuahuas could ride around with me while I was doing housework. We have two small "yip dogs" who love to be held. I ordered a small because hey... our dogs (full blooded chihuahuas) are small, right? Apparently there are some real TINY pooches out there and the small must be for them! While "Jeffrey" does fit in the small, I think he would be much more comfortable in a medium. When we buy another one we will get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10 lb. toy poodle, and it didn't fit in large size. Straps are flimsy and didn't support the weight, so it just sagged with no support. I would not recommend this pack to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Mobilizing for nail clipping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the singular purpose of mobilizing my dogs for their nail clipping, which I do myself. I have a chiweenie and 2 min pins. each around 10 - 13 lbs. For years, nail clipping has been a dreaded experience of wrestling with the dogs to get them to stay still. I've be giving them a mild sedative to help with anxiety, but I feel bad drugging them. Using this to keep them still along with a cone around their necks to keep from nipping at me has made it so much easier to clip their nails.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong measurements.
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit. The measurements on the site was wrong. Going to buy next size up. Bought the next size up it fits. Like this but I thought the straps would be better if I crossed them. They are but the straps slides up around my neck which makes it uncomfortable. I need to do something so it will not slide.
customer_reviews.author: tina_s

customer_reviews.title: Very small and not secure, AMAZING customer service
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is very small, the medium size barely fits my 7 pound cat. The zippers that secure the pet into the holster do not appear to be very secure and I worry they will come undone. Edit: I was contacted by the seller, offering to replace my carrier with a larger size, free of charge. This is amazing customer service and I have updated my review from 2 stars to 3 stars because of this. I will update this review after I receive the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: L. Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. However, it's not very comfortable to wear. Next time, I'll try criss-crossing the straps to maybe distribute weight better, but my shoulders were hurting after just a few minutes. Padded straps (more like a backpack) would be a huge improvement. ***Update: the company sent me their new model with padded straps, and it's SO much better! Very comfy now. My cat even tolerates it!***
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False product description
customer_reviews.text: The size and dimensions are completely false. This "extra large" carrier is even smaller than the makers small size carrier states. They said the chest was over 20 inches....nothing on this carrier is even close to that. I couldnt even fit my corgi puppy into this "extra large".....extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier so much. I got a medium for my 7 pound yorkie. He loves being carried like a baby and gets so excited when I get it out. Fits comfortably and is a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Borowski

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and so did I
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I was trying to open the package my dog was already trying to see what it was by jumping up at me. She didn’t fittle around when I put her in the inside. She just sat there relaxed lol, actually was trying to fall asleep in it. It’ fits perfectly and is very comfortable for me and her. Got a size medium for a Chihuahua mixed dog at 7 pounds. And honestly, the pet carrier makes me feel even more connected with her. So I highly recommend 😍
customer_reviews.author: salena

customer_reviews.title: These seem to run small
customer_reviews.text: Based on my dogs size I ordered a medium. He’s an 11lb cockapoo. The medium didn’t fit whatsoever. My fathers dog is an 8lb cockapoo. She fits quite snug in it leading me to believe I got one mislabeled perhaps. Either way at least she can use it. Seems comfy enough though I didn’t wear it more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Emery Miller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CARRIER!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carrier. We got a large (size b?) for our 13 pound (very chubby) geriatric Pomeranian. It fits him great and he loves it too! Our 11 pound yorkie also likes to hang out in it, also it’s a little big for him- but still doable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you’re a pet parent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention ever! My furbaby loves this carrier and it’s comfortable for pet owner and pet baby! I have a 9 lbs chihuahua and he fit the small perfectly! A little loose but it’s okay :)! It’s well made and I love the design with multiple colors! My family loved it so much they ended up buying this exact one for their fur babies!!! Highly recommending! Your pet will be happy close to you and it’s super cute/funny! Also this is backpack is super helpful when clipping your fur baby’s nails. You have more control with a help of another person! Multi-purpose backpack! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: SMTWNGalTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat - he is an adult but not terribly large or fat. Around 9 lbs. I got a size large, because that was what was recommended in the size chart. It was too small and the wrong dimensions for a cat. Maybe it would fit a dog, but my cat wriggled out and it seemed to large in the bottom and too small at the top. Would not recommend for a cat, and if you do buy this, I would recommend sizing up (although not sure if that would solve the problem). I returned it - cute in concept but not in practice.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Niles

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I purchased this in August 5, 2019. Today is July 3, 2020. I’ve use this 15 times and there is a tear where the straps are. Very disappointed. Fits my little 15 lbs dog very nicely. I use this when our family is biking or hiking. The dog hugs nicely to my chest making him feel secured. The only thing that I don't like is that when I move left or right, his entire body weight swings. I'm not sure how this would be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bui

customer_reviews.title: ... dog around in this and Gus really seems to enjoy it as well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves carrying her little dog around in this and Gus really seems to enjoy it as well!! 12 lb. Chihuahua/Jack Russel-medium is snug, we're going to try the large.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium Pawboo Pet Carrier for my 4.5 Lb 11 week old Shorkie puppy based on reviews. Although she fits in it, it seems a bit too snug in the neck area since she isn’t full grown yet. I’m hoping it will fit better as she grows to her anticipated weight of 7-8 lbs. The product appears to be well made. The 3 star rating on comfort is for the dog. It would be a 5 star comfort rating for me. The small might have fit her better right now at 11 weeks, however I believe it would have been too small too quickly. All in all nice product.
customer_reviews.author: BooBooBaby

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but definitely fulfills a need
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to bring my dog along for bike rides. This little harness fits that purpose. He loves riding around in it. It isn't perfect though - the straps are really slippery and tend to lengthen and "slide" out of the clips that keep them shortened. The placement of the shoulder pads are also kind of awkward. Finally, there are no instructions, so figuring out how they're supposed to be worn is a little confusing. Even when tightened, the lower part dangles too freely, especially on a bike. Would have been perfect with a horizontal strap that went around your back (kind of like a chest strap on a regular backpack).
customer_reviews.author: Jon Y.

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this pet carrier! It's so soft inside and the camo on the outside looks awesome!!! I was wearing it at the pet store the other day and another lady loved it so much that she's going to buy one too! I told her to get this one! It is super easy to put on. I like wearing it around the house too so Jax can be close to me and he loves looking around at everything going on from that viewpoint. ❤❤❤❤🐾🐾🐾🐾
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Only 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: Really love it. Went hiking and brought it incase she got tired. Took puppy rappelling with me, I crisscross straps in the back and I turned pack around so puppy legs were agains me to make sure she was snug enough that there wasn't away for her to climb out. Love it, (but don't like that it doesn't have a latch to secure her in the pack). I had a different pack before she grew out of it, it had the safety factor of the latch. Everywhere I go, everyone ask where I got it. We personally like it. Just have to be careful she doesn't fall out. That's when I turn it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR FLUFFY DOGS
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my very fluffy Pomeranian who hates going on walks. It fit her fine, but the zipper doesn't have a fabric flap on the inside to protect the dog from their fur getting caught in the zipper. There is absolutely no way to zip or unzip it without all of the dog's hair getting CAUGHT IN THE ZIPPER. We had to cut her out of it. I'm sure this would work fine if your dog didn't have a lot of fur, but if they do - BE WARY.
customer_reviews.author: Gaven

customer_reviews.title: Getting him to put it ON.
customer_reviews.text: I drag this gizmo out of the closet and slither in. The zippers give me a bit of trouble as did adjusting the straps. My baby teeth just fell out and the zippers are tough on my gums you see. But once I'm in, I'm good. The HARD part is getting the big fat gomer to come over and put the darn thing on! Once he finally puts his cocktail down and comes over, he puts me on and life is GREAT. I just chill and try my best to look irresistible. Then he wanders around and lets people adore me. Lowes, Home Depot, The liquor store, TJMaxx, you name it. It's the bomb. Highly recommend. Buf!
customer_reviews.author: Big Fat Daddy Man

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I am not in love with this carrier. I wanted it to be so much more. The foam shoulder pads might as well not even be installed because the foam is so thin. The Velcro seems light weight and it makes me nervous as it has come undone. My dog seems very comfortable once I have him in it and on me. It does work but I am not sure how long it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: FAR TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The overview indicates dogs up to 20 lbs. However, the pack was FAR TOO SMALL for my 20 lb Shih Tzu. I don't think a dog above 12 or 13 lbs could fit; it was also much too short; the bag only came up to the middle of her chest. I ordered the largest size. Unfortunately, with the coronavirus going on, I missed the return window and will just have to discard it.
customer_reviews.author: LisainPasadena

customer_reviews.title: so in love
customer_reviews.text: We instantly fell in love with this front pack. Our 6 pound chorkie fits well in the medium size. He is always excited to jump in..and relaxes quickly. The opening for his tail is great and the material for the leg openings is very soft and smooth. The side zippers allow for quick in and quick out. And, the adjustable straps are comfortable & fit on me so nicely. Our chorkie prefers to be held and close to me, and this is a great solution to make him happy, and me at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Jill F

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are way off
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this product but their sizes are way off. I ordered a medium for a puppy frenchie and it’s way too small. The Medium should be considered a small and the large should be a medium. Very disappointed! Please contact me
customer_reviews.author: Micah Crump Jr

customer_reviews.title: Order up a sizr, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 pound poodle and measured her in advanve, ordering the large, but it is too small. This is a very well made product so i will give the large to my daughtrr for her doxie weiner dog and order the XL MY dog is a chicken chaser still so jas to always be on a leadnwhile walking our property so i got this to carr for puoltry hands free so she can hopefully get used to them and calm the heck down, she cries loudlynlike a small child! Will also use this for bike riding safely with her while our Walker Hounf can run.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: So I actually had to return the first one I got because I got a small but my dog really needs a medium. The small fit him width wise but not length wise. Hes a chihuahua mix but we don't know what hes mixed with. Hes about 8lbs for reference. I imagine the small would fit a purebred chihuahua just fine. Just got the medium in the mail today and I love it! Not sure how he feels about it yet, but at least he's not terrified of it lol. He seems comfortable and sturdy in it. Love that it has zippers and velcro to keep him extra secure!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Needs Padding on the straps!
customer_reviews.text: This item is fine for the dog, but the straps are very thin and uncomfortable for the human carrying the dog! I was so excited for this bc I have a lazy canine who gives up on walks halfway through. I was expecting it to feel more like a backpack, even those have some padding on the back straps. This, however, is just a strap with zero padding and it digs into your skin with any weight on it. I still plan to use it, and probably add my own padding some how to the straps
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor adventures with our frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little carrier! We got a pup a few weeks ago and he still needs his second round of shots. This has allowed us to take him outdoors without the worry of him running around. Despite him looking miserable in the first pic, he doesn’t seem to mind it and isn’t fussy in it. He has a resting sad face so ignore that part. I’m not sure whether this is meant to be used both ways, but we noticed our pup feels more comfortable if he can see us and luckily we were able to turn him in this. For reference we got a size medium and our baby is a two month old French bulldog.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 12 lb Jack Russell/Terrier mix hates everything. He hates people, he hates dogs, he can't stand being in an airplane carrier (we moved from the states to Spain), but he actually loves this thing. I've used it walking and biking. It's a great deal, but my biggest complaint is lack of abdominal and chest straps. My back does hurt quite a bit wearing it. But, we've been able to go on adventures I would not have otherwise thought possible with this guy who usually can't stand being cooped up.
customer_reviews.author: Frog Owner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Got a large for my yorkie.. it was a fight putting this on coz he doesnt like anything on him. But once i got him in the backpack he seems so relax. I carried him around my place just to get use to it. I know he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Evey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and uncomfortable for us both
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one based on the specs they give for sizing. WAY TOO BIG. The second one I ordered 2 sizes down and it's the right size, but heres the thing: this is ridiculously difficult to use. Getting my pooch in is difficult and getting it on is even worse. After you spend 10 sweaty minutes getting it on, it's not comfortable and my teacup frenchie looks completely traumatized and she is normally really chill. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for us and our 3lb toy poodle so far (we've used it maybe five times), and I think she'll grow into it well. I love that we can take her outside to get socialized without worrying about her picking up diseases. Minus one star because quality leaves something to be desired. Some stitching was loose at the top, and the backpack straps aren't too nice. I don't feel confident that she is secure in it, so I always keep one hand on her belly to make sure she won't topple out. All in all, I would buy again. Lots of compliments! When she's fully grown I might purchase a higher quality piece for hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Raab

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. In practice...eh.
customer_reviews.text: We had a little puppy when I bought this and really wanted to be able to take her places without putting her in a cart or her being an annoyance. Well she seem to like it OK after just a few minutes she started to cough. The design of it makes her neck fall forward and started to cut off her air supply a little bit. We tried it many times and I had to hold her up in the harness toward me so it wouldn’t choke her. A few modifications and this is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: bucknut

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well-made and perfect for any small dog to be carried around in
customer_reviews.text: Well made the last thing we need right now is great material perfect fit for a small 7 pound Yorkie that I bought for my sister while she was here visiting it came the next day which was shocking but it helped when we took the yorkie many places with us for those two weeks. Works well from the front but when I was carrying him around I loved it on my back even better. Buy one you won't regret it just make sure you measure the dog properly before ordering
customer_reviews.author: L. Biskup

customer_reviews.title: Advise ordering a size larger than measurements chart suggest
customer_reviews.text: The pet holder is as represented. It is of good quality. Prior to ordering, I did measure the pet. According to the chart, he should be comfortable in a M. Debated about ordering the size suggested on the chart or ordering the next larger size. The pet fits in the M but it is a snug fit. If there is a harness, sweater or coat it would be even more of a problem. I will keep this one but ordering an L today to allow for a more comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Laughter and a bra in one.
customer_reviews.text: Is it ridiculous? Absolutely. Does my dog seem to like it? Better than the other carriers, for certain. Does it cause uncontrollable giggling? Absofreakinglutely. It also doubles as a push up bra, and is way cheaper than any other push-up bras on the market. My puppy is. 3.5 lb Pomeranian and fit well in a size small. Granted he’s mostly fluff and attitude, so there may have been room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a hiking trip for my daughter to use for her chihuahua. Worked great! It’s good quality, super comfortable and really easy to use. We love it and got a kick how of how much Chico loved it too. For our chihuahua (who is not a small toy chihuahua) we got a size large and it was the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Good for small pets with reflux/regurgitation issues
customer_reviews.text: My sweet Abbie suffers from reflux and regurgitation complications after a gallbladder removal and liver lobectomy to remove cancer. I opted to try this carrier to see if keeping her upright will help decrease the episodes. It really does help! My only complaint is the tail hole is in an uncomfortable spot for her and I have to put her tail through one of the leg holes with her leg. She may get a little embarrassed at first but she relaxes quickly and lets me carry her around like the little baby she is :)
customer_reviews.author: DogMotherWineLover

customer_reviews.title: Safe... Sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: My 5.2 pound chiahaua loves it. She is comfortable.. Safe.. Snug as a bug. I love how I can bend over with her in the carrier, And she is still secure. I walk 2 dogs both much larger as I carry her. I am comfortable.. My baby is safe... That's all I need..
customer_reviews.author: S Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: This carrier was super cute but I was never able to use it and had to return it as my puppy outgrew it immediately. We have an Australian Shepherd puppy, bought a M, and we were just able to zip it up the only time we tried it on her. Thought this would be great for going on walks since she was so small and got tired quickly. By the time we were ready to use it, she had already outgrown it. Think this would be great if you don't have a growing dog!
customer_reviews.author: aufgehts

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece. It is very comfortable for both me and the pup. Size was just right and the straps help to adjust it perfectly. When crossed on the back you feel safe and secure and it will not allow for excess movement but enough for your dog to stay comfortable. She does not squirm or show any signs of being uncomfortable. The material is of great quality and it is built to last. Great product. There will be many motorcycle rides to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My little doxie is 14. He likes to walk still, but has arthritis so i like for him to get a rest when we're out. He loves sitting in it. He's a little overweight so he doesn't fit the weight for the size I bought. Lol He still fits in it, just kinda pulls down on it due to his weight. I just have to adjust the straps to fit really tight to hold him up. He's only been in it a couple of times for a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Neisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 pound pup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet carrier. I'm so thankful my dog is patient. She didn't seem to mind being placed in the carrier even while I was making adjustments. I'm sure she even was close to falling asleep. My only complaint would be the padding on the straps isn't as thick as I would like, but it's still comfortable. My dog has a little room for growth, but I doubt a dog larger than 10 pounds would fit comfortably in the carrier. The mesh is nice to allow airflow. I love being able to carry my sweet pup around. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure
customer_reviews.text: My poodle is 4 lbs so I got the XSmall. He must be a Houdini because he wiggles out, I have to hold him in. I don’t think he feels safe in it. We’ve tried it on my husband who drives our Harley & on me so he’s between us & I think it works better with me. He is more secure between us.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my frenchie
customer_reviews.text: Nice carrier, but I wouldn’t recommend for a 15+ pound frenchie. Was a struggle to get on my boy, he seemed uncomfortable, and sadly I felt pretty ridiculous wearing it. Still on the hunt for maybe one that goes on the back without the high costs.
customer_reviews.author: BronsonLexa

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug that is 15lbs and he was falling out of this thing immediately. The weight distribution is completely off and it is not secure whatsoever. He could just lean forward and fall out of it because the Velcro is so bad. It is very uncomfortable to wear and I can't imagine it is anymore comfortable for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to get your dog into it.
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is 14.5 years old and has trouble walking. I was so excited to get this pack so that I could carry her around. Unfortunately, I couldn’t even get her into it without her screaming. The way it opens up to get her into it made her scream. I had to bend her limbs to try to wiggle her into it and she was not having it. I wish it opened up more so that less dexterity was needed to get into it.
customer_reviews.author: CoveredInDogs

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Carrier, but We Returned It
customer_reviews.text: This one seemed to fit our overweight Yorkie pretty well, but we ended up going with a different design, which you can see. The carriers where the legs poke out in front and all the weight is on their bottom didn't seem to be the best idea for an overweight dog. It just seemed like too much pressure on her behind. It was adorable though, and if I had a normal-weight Yorkie, I would definitely want one like this.
customer_reviews.author: 💗 Heather - Yorkie Mom 💗Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my 4# Chihuahua. I like that it has padded shoulders and seems quite comfortable for my dog. She loves to be carried around...now I can put her in this and do my household chores or take her along while I'm walking my big dogs. I also use it when I go for a bike ride with her. I wish it was just a little bit longer in the body area as my girl is really long and thin, but otherwise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: CareyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We like to go on long walks, but my little dog gets tired easily. I pack this carrier and when he needs a break, I just strap him on :) He still gets to enjoy being outside with us but his little legs get a break. He's very secure in it, and seems quite comfy. I love that it has a little hole for his tail, I think it adds to the comfort. I wear the straps criss crossed in the back to make it more comfortable for myself to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Backpack runs small
customer_reviews.text: We have a 14lb Maltese and without looking at the specifications, assumed he was a size medium like most of his other accessories. Wrong. We could barely fit his legs in. We returned and ordered a large and an xlarge just to make sure we had one to fit in time for an event we were attending. The large was also too small. The X-large fits him perfectly. I wish there was some padding in the straps to help with the weight. He may not be pleased to sit in it, but we're happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adriahnna

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog so I could carry her while snowshoeing and I LOVE IT! Seriously one of the best things I’ve got for my dog and a great price! You can wear it on the front or the back and it’s super easy to adjust. I got the large size for my 11 pound rat terrier mix because she’s pretty long! It fits her great. She seems so content in it and she was looking around at the scenery while on our adventure! We went a few miles even and she seemed comfortable and the straps were conftorable in me too. I’m going to get so much use out of this and I totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Camryn B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our new carrier ! Lola is a 13lb Bichon frise! So at first she was a bit iffy but now she's used to it..and might I add she looks friggen adorable in it .. shes a bit old, so she gets anxious when she's left home alone for hrs, and after a while she gets tired.. so this is perfect for when we go out for long hrs, for our long walks and she's also able to go food shopping with us.. definitely looking forward to creating more memories! We've gotten lots of compliments from people!
customer_reviews.author: Arlette Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier for biking!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 other carriers. Each one I like for various reasons but none of them were perfect for riding my bike with my 3lb papillon until I bought this one. It just looked so awkward for the dog and I could not understand how she would like it. Out of desperation, I bought it and I am so glad I did! It is perfect for her. She likes being up close to me and she does not swing when I bent into the handle bars. Best part is my knees do not strike the bottom of it every time I petal. And she is completely restrained and safe. And she loved it!!! Win win for both.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Large size for my 9lb frenchie and he fits great, with room to grow! I have 2 older + larger dogs and one is very clumsy, so now I can put my little guy in this while I’m doing things around the house. He loved it right away! It’s soft but sturdy, and he seems to be very comfortable in it. I wear it in my chest, but I think it would work pretty well as a backpack, too. Also, he looks freaking adorable in it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Even for a toy dog, order a M
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but the sizing chart is definitely off for the small. I have a 5lb toy dog and it wasn’t spacious enough to zip her up. Also, it didn’t feel secure. Most likely the thin straps. I wanted to put her on my back instead but I couldn’t figure out how to place her up there and strap her in without scaring her or dropping her. Definitely would have needed someone else to assist and that isn’t an option for us.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great for a moto-dog
customer_reviews.text: This carrier works perfect for my Frenchie. We ride dirtbikes and our pup had fun around the yard so we decided to try this out for cruises around on the bigger bikes. When she was 5-8 pounds she fit perfect in the small. But now that she’s around 10 pounds we are moving up to a size large to accommodate her continued growth. She sits in the carrier for almost 2 hours sometimes and has no troubles. She enjoys herself and feels very secure. The only reason I don’t give 5 stars is the strap padding always moves around so it can get a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it's only 16.99!
customer_reviews.text: This little bag is so cute. Fits my 3 pound Chihuahua perfectly...very roomy for him. I am impressed by the quality of the fabric and the sturdiness of the construction. I also have a 5 pound chihuahua and I am pretty sure she will fit just fine. I have a 9 pound pekingese and I don't think he will fit. If I find out differently I will update my review. Order with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: my dog is still a puppy, but based on how big the vet said she would probably get, I purchased the large carrier based on the reviews given. Should have purchased the medium, she is almost to predicted weight and the carrier is still way too big for her. She actually sits sideways in it to be comfortable. Am trying to figure out what I can do to still be able to use it. The straps are not comfortable either, they don't hold her "up", I have to support her with one hand so the straps don't rub against the back of my neck. Great idea, I am just not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brat

customer_reviews.title: Works great and well built.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our little she-poo dog and he really seems to enjoy it. The wife says it is pretty comfortable and she has worn in many times to and from the dog park and out downtown, both of which are about 3-4 miles round trip. Only major issue so far is the area between the hind legs does tend to get a little 'poopy' since it sits right on his anal area, but overall hasn't been too much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for long hair puppers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute idea but not meant for long haired dogs. My Yorkie is all of 3 lbs. Carrying him everywhere can be difficult. He liked the carrier. Fell asleep in it, but I had a really hard time getting him in and out due to the zippers catching his fur. I tried again without using the zippers and it took forever and he still came out of it with messy knots. Probably will give this to a friend with a short hair dog. Shame, it had a real calming effect on him
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I was a lil worried that my dog wouldn’t like this. We went on a road trip where I knew we’d be going to crowded places and my dog isn’t the biggest fan of walking when there are too many people. He ended up loving it. He preferred being in his carrier rather than walking. He felt secure and had a place for his tail to fit perfectly. I always had my hands supporting him in case for my peace of mind but other than that I think he and I both enjoyed it. Me not having to worry about people stepping on him and him being happy to be so close to me. He definitely felt comforted.
customer_reviews.author: Preeti B.

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE MATERIAL FOR MY CAT BUT UNDERSTANDING COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: Says adjustable but it really isn’t all material is very rough and coarse not comfortable for my cat at all Edit: I decided to change the review from 1 star to 4. My cat is a very grumpy cat and wasn’t very comfortable in the material but the company was very understanding and gave me a full refund. They seem to really value the customers thoughts I would try using this on a younger kitten so they can adjust and be used to it in adulthood furthermore I’ll give this a product a try but every cat is different but trail and error is allowed
customer_reviews.author: Menen W

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this cute backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog that can’t walk that far anymore but she loves to go out with us. This backpack is her ticket to kick it. I can get her in here by myself and she love to be in the front. I can also use it on my back. I took her to a home improvement store and she was so happy to get all the complaints from so many people. At least 5 people asked me where I got it because they wanted to get one. Very cute patten nd definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tray Cray

customer_reviews.title: Very small, not useful
customer_reviews.text: Product very small, bought an xl based on other reviews and our 15 lb Boston terrier doesn’t fit in it. I can sausage her in but I doubt she likes it. As other reviewers mention it doesn’t feel secure, like the zipper might come undone. I can walk around with her but I’d be afraid to ride my bicycle as it is and that is why I purchased it. I’ll keep as an emergency back up for hiking if my girl gets tired but not useful for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes 2 or 3 people
customer_reviews.text: I have a really lazy 5 month old Shih Tzu that I bought this for, however when I tried to put her into this, she went bananas... It isn't as easy as it looks and would take at least 2 ppl to get her into it. I was replacing a dog sling/bag that she quickly outgrew.. I guess I'll be looking for a stroller now :/ It seems to be well made, just not for my girl
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Useful for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large size carrier for my miniature poodle. She weighs 15 pounds but is long for a miniature and this carrier works. It might be a bit short for her long body but she was comfortable and did not panic when we put her in it (something she is inclined to do when trying something new). I won't use it very often but I wanted it for long hikes through the mountainsides of Idaho where various weeds grow that can get caught in her paws or in her nose and this carrier fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure we will use this for practical purposes (like extending walks when my older Yorkie wants to go out with the more hardy dogs). But the dancing potential made us both pretty happy...and had my family laughing! My Yorkie is about 6.5 pounds and furry and the medium fit perfectly. The colors are vibrant and fun!
customer_reviews.author: liz winchell

customer_reviews.title: Only for short, easy walks
customer_reviews.text: This carrier works OK. It’s not real sturdy, causing my dog to lean more forward and off center. The tail hole isn’t very big and doesn’t align well with my dogs behind shape (12 lb chihuahua mix). The shoulder pads don’t stay in place either. It works alright if I’m walking 2 miles or less, but uncomfortable for both of us on longer walks/hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 5lbs yorkie absolutely loves it. She fits comfortably in a size small and is able to stay calm and relaxed while walking around. She also LOVED all the attention she was getting. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maritza S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got XL for my 19lbs pup, so we can cycle together. It has been a great experience!!! Only thing shoulder padsings move and stripes are hurting my shiders. I stitched mine and stabilized them ao wasn't a big problem. Also unfortunately it's not made of natural material like cotton etc so makes me and the puppy sweat in the chest &tummy area.
customer_reviews.author: ozlem

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a hiking trip for my pup. She’s not that active and I knew I’d end up carrying her after a while. If I would’ve gotten a quarter for each time someone stopped me to say how cute she looks I would’ve had a couple hundred bucks lol she’s a shorkie mic and about 11 pounds And I ordered the large for her based off of reviews. She was comfortable no complaints from her. And it was easy to use. I love that I could adjust the straps too
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: He don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates this product. and I think my dog is just a little too heavy at 21 lbs to make this a comfortable thing to use with any real frequency. IT's also not easy to get him in as he resists being plopped into it. But these aren't really complaints of the product which hasn't broken despite my dog's best efforts. This product is probably better for a smaller, lighter, more cooperative dog. I didn't return the product because I am sure I will need it someday, but I haven't used it much.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good product - would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Took our Yorkie on vacation with us. She actually didn’t seem to mind this carrier. It allowed us to go into stores, etc that she wouldn’t have been allowed in otherwise. We also used it when it rained - used an umbrella and we both stayed dry. Some people thought this was cute, however some looked at me like “she needs to get a life” (😂😂😂).
customer_reviews.author: Marcia E.

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for dachshunds
customer_reviews.text: While the quality and functionality of the product was fine, it didn’t work out for my dachshund. The design doesn’t accommodate the long body of a miniature dachshund. His back had to contort in order to fit his arms through the holes, even though we got a large. Probably works fine with 99% of other breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Midlinda

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog carrier
customer_reviews.text: We have a 20 lb Maltese/terrier mix dog and he fits well in this carrier (XL). It opens down the sides, so you can stand the dog in it and then zip it up before lifting the carrier up to position. This makes it much easier to put the dog in it than some that require you to lift the dog into the carrier. Seems sturdy and the straps can either be crossed in the back or straight.
customer_reviews.author: JIR

customer_reviews.title: Charlie was super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Charlie loves this purchase! He is a 7 lbs senior Chihuahua, and we got this doggy-bjorn so we could go on a bike ride or just easily carry him along. I got the medium after reading a lot of the reviews and that is the perfect size for my small dog. He was very comfy in it, and even fell asleep for 2 hours. There was no struggle getting him in and out. If you have a small pet and want to easily carry it along, I say purchase this wonderful carrier :-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as expected. Six pound poodle is a tight fit and back straps doesn't seem supportive enough. After some alternations I will make it better.
customer_reviews.author: thebrat74

feature_bullets: 【Recommended for Small Medium Pet】: Pawaboo dog carrier backpack is designed for carrying small medium dogs/cats, we highly recommend for puppies less than to 15 LB (The larger dog may bring too much weight-bearing for the owner). Please DO measure your pets and choose according to the size chart.

【Considerate Detail-oriented Design】: Legs-out and tail-out design keep your pet safe and comfortable; Hook and loop, zipper and elastic openings allow you to fit your dog inside comfortably; Quick Release Buckles on the end of straps ensure quick installation with just one hand.

【Customer Experience Comes First】: We always stand behind our customers and try best to meet your needs. We have made several upgraded improvements such as thickening shoulder pad sponge, using upgraded breathable mesh and polyester fiber material, which makes the carrier more durable and comfortable.

【Two Ways of Wearing】: A hands-free pet carrier can be worn on your front side or your backside if you like, it keeps you closer and increases pet's sense of security when you carry your cat or dog around. Meanwhile, the thickened sponge pad helps to relieve the burden of your shoulder.

【Enjoy Trips with Your Pet】: This backpack carrier is lightweight and portable, you can use it to carry small dogs or cats for biking, hiking, camping, out walking or meeting friends. It allows owners and their lovely pets to have more adventures together, what's more, it's also a great photo prop to take funny pictures for daily sharing.
